diagnosticTests.name: Physical Examination
diagnosticTests.description: Complete physical assessment including vital signs, body condition, hydration status

diagnosticTests.name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
diagnosticTests.description: Analysis of blood cells and platelets

diagnosticTests.name: Biochemistry Panel
diagnosticTests.description: Liver, kidney, and metabolic function tests

diagnosticTests.name: Cortisol Testing
diagnosticTests.description: ACTH stimulation or dexamethasone suppression test

diagnosticTests.name: Chest X-Ray
diagnosticTests.description: Thoracic radiography for heart, lungs, mediastinum

diagnosticTests.name: Abdominal X-Ray
diagnosticTests.description: Abdominal radiography for organs, foreign bodies, gas patterns

diagnosticTests.name: Abdominal Ultrasound
diagnosticTests.description: Soft tissue imaging of abdominal organs

diagnosticTests.name: Echocardiogram
diagnosticTests.description: Cardiac ultrasound for structure and function

diagnosticTests.name: CT Scan
diagnosticTests.description: Cross-sectional imaging for detailed anatomical assessment

diagnosticTests.name: MRI Scan
diagnosticTests.description: Magnetic resonance imaging for soft tissue detail

diagnosticTests.name: Blood Culture
diagnosticTests.description: Sterile blood collection for bacterial/fungal culture

diagnosticTests.name: Bile Acid Testing
diagnosticTests.description: Pre and post-prandial bile acid levels

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Max hasn't been eating well and seems tired. He vomited a few times yesterday.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: No recent travel or diet changes. Up to date on vaccinations.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Whiskers has been eating more but losing weight. She seems very active, almost manic.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Indoor cat, no recent stressors. Drinking more water lately.

cases.title: Canine Heart Failure

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Buddy gets tired easily and has been coughing at night. He can't walk as far as he used to.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Breed predisposition to heart disease. Previous murmur noted 2 years ago.

cases.correctDiagnosis: Mitral valve disease with congestive heart failure

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Thunder is showing signs of severe abdominal pain, rolling and pawing. Started suddenly this morning.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Fed normally yesterday. Recent change to new hay batch.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Polly has been breathing heavily and has discharge from her nose. She's not talking as much as usual.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Recently introduced new bird to household. Diet unchanged.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Bella has been drinking and urinating excessively. She's lost weight but is still eating well.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Spayed female. No previous health issues. Recent heat cycle before spaying.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Felix has been straining in the litter box and I noticed blood in his urine. He keeps going back to the box repeatedly.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Indoor cat, dry food diet. Recent stress from moving house.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Spike's jaw feels soft and he's been having tremors. He seems to have trouble walking normally.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Diet consists mainly of lettuce and crickets. No UVB lighting. Housed indoors.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Bessie's rear left udder quarter is swollen and hot. The milk looks abnormal with chunks in it.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Recently calved 3 weeks ago. Good milker previously. Other cows unaffected.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Zeus's belly is hugely swollen and he keeps trying to vomit but nothing comes up. He can't settle down.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Ate large meal 3 hours ago then went for a run. Breed predisposed to bloat.

symptoms.description: Weight loss and poor coat condition

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Shadow has been drinking more water and losing weight gradually. His coat doesn't look as good as it used to.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Senior cat, previous dental disease. Indoor/outdoor cat.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Lucky has had three seizures in the past month. They last about 2 minutes and she's confused afterwards but then returns to normal.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: No known toxin exposure. Seizures occur at random times. Normal behavior between episodes.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Nibbles hasn't been eating her pellets and I've noticed much fewer droppings in her cage. She's sitting hunched up.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Diet change to new pellet brand 3 days ago. Usually very active and social.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Molly has developed a pot belly and pants a lot even when resting. Her coat is getting thin.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Increased appetite and thirst. Muscle weakness noted. Previously on long-term steroids for allergies.

cases.title: Feline Cardiomyopathy

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Mittens has been breathing rapidly and I saw him breathing with his mouth open. He's been hiding under the bed.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Previously healthy. No known heart murmur. Obese cat.

cases.correctDiagnosis: Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy with congestive heart failure

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Ruby has become very weak and her gums look pale. I noticed her skin and eyes look yellowish.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Recent vaccination 10 days ago. No toxin exposure known. Breed predisposition.

symptoms.description: Reluctance to move and shifting weight

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Star is barely walking and stands with her weight shifted back on her heels. She seems to be in pain.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Got into grain room 4 days ago. Overweight mare. Previous episodes of foot sensitivity.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Sunny has been straining and wagging her tail. She's sitting on the bottom of the cage looking fluffed up.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Has been laying eggs regularly. No mate present. Seed-based diet.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Cooper has been vomiting and seems to be in abdominal pain. He keeps getting into a prayer-like position.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Fed table scraps including bacon 3 days ago. Breed predisposition to pancreatitis.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Smokey has episodes of wheezing and coughing. During bad episodes, he breathes with his mouth open and crouches down.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Episodes triggered by dusty litter or stress. Owner smokes in house.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Bear has trouble getting up and runs with a bunny-hopping gait. He doesn't want to exercise as much as he used to.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Large breed dog. Parents not hip-scored. Rapid growth phase.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Daisy is very weak and depressed. She's not eating and her breath has a sweet smell. She's due to calve in 2 weeks.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Twin pregnancy confirmed on ultrasound. Body condition score 2/5. Poor pasture quality.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Slither has been breathing through her mouth and making wheezing sounds. There's mucus visible in her mouth.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Enclosure humidity recently dropped. Temperature gradient maintained. Recent substrate change.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Ginger has been vomiting regularly and losing weight. Her stools are often soft.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Multiple diet changes tried. No response to antibiotic therapy. Indoor cat.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Luna has episodes where she becomes very weak and almost collapses. She's been vomiting and having diarrhea.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Previously on long-term steroids for allergies, recently discontinued. Young adult female.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Charlie has been having trouble breathing with discharge from his nose. His droppings are green-yellow and his eyes look irritated.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Recently purchased from pet store. No quarantine period. Owner developed flu-like symptoms.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Spirit has had a chronic cough and clear nasal discharge. His exercise tolerance has decreased significantly.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Stabled horse, hay-fed. Symptoms worse in winter when stabled more. Previous respiratory episodes.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Rex suddenly started limping on his back leg after running in the yard. His knee looks swollen and he won't put weight on it.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Large breed dog, overweight. Heard a 'pop' sound when injury occurred.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Patches stopped eating completely 5 days ago. Her skin and eyes have turned yellow and she's very lethargic.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Obese cat, recent stress from house move. Previously healthy appetite.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Buddy has severe bloody diarrhea and has been vomiting. He's very dehydrated and won't eat or drink.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Unvaccinated puppy. Recent exposure to other dogs at park. Rescued from shelter.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Chewy has been having trouble eating and I've noticed him drooling. He's lost weight and keeps pawing at his mouth.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Diet consists mainly of pellets and occasional treats. No dental chews provided.

symptoms.description: Poor coat quality and hair loss

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Sadie has gained weight and become very sluggish. Her coat looks dull and she's losing hair, especially on her tail.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Spayed female. Seeks warm places. Exercise tolerance decreased. Breed predisposition.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Tank hasn't had a bowel movement in over a week and his belly looks swollen. He's not eating as much.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Sand substrate in enclosure. Recent change in diet. Temperature gradient appropriate.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Bella's milk production dropped dramatically and she's not eating well. Her left side looks distended.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Recently calved 1 week ago. High-producing dairy cow. Previous history of ketosis.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Oscar keeps going to the litter box but can't urinate. He's crying and seems very distressed. His belly feels hard.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Male cat, dry food diet. Previous episodes of straining. Recent stress from new cat in household.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Princess has developed bruises all over her body and her gums have tiny red spots. She's had several nosebleeds.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Recent vaccination 2 weeks ago. No known toxin exposure. Previously healthy.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Rio has been regurgitating and seems weak with some neurological problems. His droppings are an unusual green color.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Free-flight in house. Recent home renovation with old paint removal. Likes to chew on objects.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Blaze has been eating less and losing weight. He's become sensitive when girthing and his performance has declined.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Competition horse, high-grain diet. Recent increase in training intensity. Some colic episodes.

symptoms.description: Acute back pain and reluctance to move

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Wiener suddenly developed severe back pain and is reluctant to move. His back legs seem weak and he's hunched over.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Breed predisposition. Jumped off couch yesterday. Previous mild back episodes.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Mama has been having muscle spasms and seems very hot. She's panting and can't settle down. She's nursing 5 kittens.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Nursing mother with large litter. Kittens are 3 weeks old. Good body condition pre-pregnancy.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Gruff makes a loud breathing noise, especially when excited. His bark sounds different and he can't tolerate heat or exercise.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Senior large breed dog. Symptoms worse with excitement or heat. Previous episodes of collapse.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Fuzzy was left in a hot car briefly and now she's panting heavily, very weak, and drooling.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Accidentally left in car for 30 minutes on hot day. Usually very active. No previous health problems.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Baby has a red, burned area on her crop and won't eat. She's been regurgitating her food.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Hand-feeding baby bird. Formula may have been too hot. First-time bird owner.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Spot developed severe skin ulcers and erosions around his nose and mouth. He seems systemically ill with fever.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Previously healthy. No known allergies. Recent stress from moving house.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Smoky suddenly can't use his back legs and is crying in pain. His back legs feel cold and I can't feel a pulse.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Known heart murmur. Previously diagnosed with cardiomyopathy. On cardiac medications.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Shelly has been straining and restless for 2 days. Her shell looks distended and she's not eating well.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Mature female turtle. No suitable nesting site provided. Previous successful egg laying.

symptoms.description: Head tilt and loss of balance

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Dizzy suddenly developed a head tilt and keeps falling over. Her eyes are moving rapidly back and forth.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Senior dog. No recent trauma. Previous ear infections. Appetite maintained.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: River developed severe diarrhea and fever. Now she's showing signs of laminitis in her front feet.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Pastured near creek. Late summer timing. No recent travel or diet changes.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Noble has swollen glands under his jaw and neck. He's lost weight and seems less energetic than usual.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Breed predisposition. Previously healthy. Nodes feel firm and mobile.

ownerReport.chiefComplaint: Shadow is breathing very heavily with his mouth open and seems very sick. He's had a fever and won't eat.
ownerReport.additionalNotes: Outdoor cat, recent fighting with other cats. Previous bite wounds noted.
